Stocks close down 
2019-08-30
Chinese stocks closed lower yesterday, with the Shanghai Composite Index down 0.1 percent, at 2,890.92 points. The Shenzhen Component Index closed 0.16 percent lower at 9,398.46 points. The combined turnover of the two bourses fell to 478.16 billion yuan (US$67.48 billion) from 493.64 billion yuan the previous trading day. Losers outnumbered gainers by 920 to 535 on the Shanghai bourse and 1,261 to 835 in Shenzhen.
